data.name: Spectral Showdown
data.detailed_description:
Do you like Prop Hunt? Too bad! This is Spectral Showdown!

Overview

In Spectral Showdown, You possess creatures and fight your friends, family or greatest enemies to the death using the creature's abilities! Similar to prop hunt, but animals instead! The last one standing wins! Play offline or online and watch as your friendships begin to crumble! Unlock achievements for being the greatest fighter out of your friends or even for simply trying your best (we won't judge).

Key Features

  • Offline/Online play (includes LAN) for up to 4 players.
  • Same keyboard support so you can play together on the same keyboard (offline-only).
  • 2 Maps.
  • Achievements.
  • Cartoony style.

data.short_description: Spectral Showdown is a party brawl game where you fight your friends, family or greatest enemies to the death. Possess creatures at your will and use their abilities to help you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-10210U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any.
  • Additional Notes: Network connection is required for online.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any.
  • Additional Notes: Network connection is required for online. These requirements are NOT final.
